title: Off-grid Morning Routine
content: Woke up to the sound of wind brushing through Kawayanan...Woke up to the sound of wind brushing through Kawayanan...Woke up to the sound of wind brushing through Kawayanan...Woke up to the sound of wind brushing through Kawayanan...Woke up to the sound of wind brushing through Kawayanan...

title: Client Deadlines and Storms
content: When the rain hits the roof this hard, the WiFi decides...When the rain hits the roof this hard, the WiFi decides...When the rain hits the roof this hard, the WiFi decides...When the rain hits the roof this hard, the WiFi decides...When the rain hits the roof this hard, the WiFi decides...
